msContents.summary:
The text begins with the Vairāgyaprakaraṇa and first the colophon in the manuscript found on folio
iti śrīvālmikiye vairāgyaprakaraṇannāmaprathamaḥ sargaḥ, but actually the verse before the chapter colophon is from the 11th sarga of the published edition Yoga Vasistha Of Mahakavi Valmiki Vol. I Dr. Mahaprabhulal Goswami (Tara book Agency first edition 1988) and end of the chapter Ten according to the digital edition available on Gretil. The information of the edition followed at the gretil is not available on the page. The same way the first verse of the manuscript is divi bhūmau… is according to the above mentioned edition is the beginning of the second sarga and according to the Gretil is the beginning of the first sarga of the Vairāgyaprakaraṇa. Apart from this it is found that the manuscript does not follow the order of the verses. It omits or it mixes number of verses from the chapters. For example as the end of the first chapter has verses from the 10th chapter. Similarly on the last folio the new chapter begins with the verse number 9 from the 5th section of the Vasiṣṭha rāmāyaṇ which is known as Mumukṣuprakaraṇa. Folio are not in order. Seems that some folio are missing. The manuscript has different order of the verses so Research is required to determine which recension of the Vasiṣṭha Rāmāyaṇ this manuscript belongs to.
